name: WEED Token
description: Addicted is a new onchain simulation game that puts players in the role of building and managing their own virtual weed empire. Players can set up their farms, cultivate different cannabis strains, and experiment with unique growth strategies. Every action, from planting to harvesting to trading, is fully executed onchain, ensuring transparency, ownership, and verifiable game mechanics. By combining strategy, trading, and simulation, Addicted creates a highly immersive experience that goes beyond simple gameplay — it’s about competing, expanding, and thriving in a decentralized economy.
